item.title: Hugo Host on Github
item.author: betheone.y@gmail.com (Teletubby)
item.description: Use GitHub to Host a Free Static Website Included in Hugo Blog This is an easy way to host your blog and a quick way. Change Your Publish Directory Delete “public” folder Delete it first, if your blog’s root directory has a “public” folder. sudo rm -rf dd Change publish directory to “docs” $ hugo --destination docs --gc server Execute this command would change your publish directory to “docs” folder, and start hugo server.
item.dc:creator: Teletubby

item.title: Git Basic Commands 1
item.author: betheone.y@gmail.com (Teletubby)
item.description: Included in Hugo Blog (Do u want to build a static website for yourself?) Included in Git Commands & FAQ git clone There are 2 ways to use git clone 1. Using HTTPS This is a simple way to clone github repos from others or you. git clone HTTPS(https://github.com/example.git) 2. Using SSH This command only can clone the repository which it’s owner give U Private key or clone own repository.
item.dc:creator: Teletubby

item.title: Install Git
item.author: betheone.y@gmail.com (Teletubby)
item.description: Included in Hugo Blog (Do u want to build a static website for yourself?) What is Git? Git is a free, open source distributed version control system tool designed to handle everything from small to very large projects with speed and efficiency. reference https://git-scm.com/ Download Git Windows Linux MacOS choco install git.install #or scoop install git If you didn’t install any package manager or installer, like choco, scoop
item.dc:creator: Teletubby

item.title: Hello Hugo
item.author: betheone.y@gmail.com (Teletubby)
item.description: Let’s Build a Static Website Included in Hugo Blog Why Hugo? & What is Hugo? Hugo is a fast and modern static site generator written in Go, and designed to make website creation fun again. … Since websites are viewed far more often than they are edited, Hugo is designed to provide an optimal viewing experience for your website’s end users and an ideal writing experience for website authors. reference https://gohugo.
item.dc:creator: Teletubby

item.title: Solve the problem that git pull/push needs to enter the password every timeï¼ˆUse GitHub private repoï¼‰
item.author: betheone.y@gmail.com (Teletubby)
item.description: Included in Git Commands & FAQ Solve the problem that git pull/push needs to enter the password every timeï¼ˆUse GitHub private repoï¼‰ git bash at the folder that you needs to operate. git config --global credential.helper store then do git pull or git pushï¼Œwill be prompted to enter your userName and userPasswd. No longer needed next time This operation will generate a text locally, which records the userName and userPasswd you just entered
item.dc:creator: Teletubby
